Messages

{{message}}
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { MessageService } from "../helper-files/message.services"; @Component({ selector: 'app-app-messages', templateUrl: './app-messages.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app-messages.component.css'], }) export class AppMessagesComponent { @Input() messages: string[] = ['sdssds']; constructor(public messageService: MessageService) {} }
